RATING 5.0 Arbys Fast Food 308 South 1st Street, La Grange (502) 222-9612 LATEST REVIEW Arby's by far is the best fast food resturant in Lagrange. Its clean, and the crew and managers are always nice and they know most of the people that come in by name!!!!! I love it there!!!! Ricky, Angie, April, Tabitha, are all great people!!! REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
RATING 5.0 Domino's Pizza - Lagrange Pizzeria, Fast Food 604 Crystal Drive Suite 1, La Grange (502) 222-2202 LATEST REVIEW DOMINOS IS AMAZING!! SO IS THE BEAUTIFUL GIRL THAT WORKS THERE, TIFFANY. SHE IS SO FRIENDLY ON THE PHONE. EVERYONE IS SO NICE AND THEY HAVE AMAZING FOOD! REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
RATING 5.0 Papa John's Pizza - Lagrange Italian, Pizzeria, Fast Food 1848 South Highway 53, La Grange (502) 225-0949 LATEST REVIEW We are CRABIZ a local LaGrange Business . We order Pizza every Satuday from this Pappa John's and this is without a doubt the best deal and the best pizza in town...We Love It !!! REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO

I go to both and alway order my granddaughter plain cheesebugers (3) with big mac sauce and I pay .25 extra which is fine. I drive home 10 mi away and 1 will hav...
